events.name: Google I/O 17 Live Viewing Party
events.description:
Google I/O is Google's annual developer conference, where they share the latest products and technologies. Google I/O 2017 will be held in Mountain View on May 17-19. If you are not attending in person, you can get the I/O experience by watching I/O Live at the website. GDG Sonargaon is organizing Google I/O Live-Viewing Party which will be held at TEXLab.

Take the awesome opportunity to connect with other local talented developers and watch the keynote and other sessions live.

events.name: Web Study Jam
events.description:
• What we'll do
Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content. Typically, Study Jams focus on completing a course, and we focused on mSite Certification training.

The Study Jams objective is to raise the technical proficiency of global community members through the highest possible course completion rate.

• What to bring
laptop, ID Card, Confirmation mail

• Important to know

events.name: mSite Study jam for Women
events.description:
• What we'll do

• What to bring
pen, Notepad

• Important to know
web basic, mobile site concept, mobile site exam

events.name: TensorFlow Viewing Party 2018 Dhaka
events.description:
Registration: https://goo.gl/forms/1Gbr5JKUd3Smg7fI2

TensorFlow Dev Summit brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for a full day of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community.
It is no question that machine learning is one of the hottest and one of the most important technology topics for developers and we think you can use this as an opportunity to build local machine learning community or engage with your local machine learning users!

Google has done a TensorFlow Dev Summit at their HQ. We along with Google's support will be viewing the TensorFlow keynote together and this will be followed by some short talks from local practitioners highlighting the key points.

We invite all the students, professionals and machine learning enthusiasts to join us and learn more about TensorFlow machine learning tools.

TensorFlow™ is an open source software library for numerical computation using data flow graphs. Nodes in the graph represent mathematical operations, while the graph edges represent the multidimensional data arrays (tensors) communicated between them. The flexible architecture allows you to deploy computation to one or more CPUs or GPUs in a desktop, server, or mobile device with a single API. TensorFlow was originally developed by researchers and engineers working on the Google Brain Team within Google's Machine Intelligence research organization for the purposes of conducting machine learning and deep neural networks research, but the system is general enough to be applicable in a wide variety of other domains as well.

Contact: JUMAED
[masked]
[masked]

events.name: I/O Extended Bangladesh 18
events.description:
Google I/O 2018, world’s largest tech conference held at Shoreline Amphitheatre in Mountain View, CA on 17th May. On the 11th year of the event, the most brilliant developer, digital experts, and technology professional joined the conference from around the world. In Bangladesh, Google I/O Extended Bangladesh 18 on Saturday, 07th July 2018.

GDG Sonargaon is working on strengthening the skill and capacity in the Web Technology in Bangladesh. By providing top knowledged session in the upcoming days GDG Sonargaon will help the Web industry to grow more and face the future challange.

Google I/O Extended Bangladesh 18 brings the whole new I/O experience to their events are focused on bringing the local developer community together to experience the keynote and other main Google I/O sessions.They also offer other unique activities targeted to developers, such as Techtalk, Seminars , codlabs .

Every year after the Google I/O main event the Extended events are hosted in Google Communities. This year the ‘Google I/O Extended Bangladesh 18 ’ event will be hosted at North South University. The event will introduce latest technologies on the whole day. Sessions for developers will take place.

The participants will be taught about the coding styles in latest Google platforms. There will be also Techtalk, Seminars , codlabs and on spot Google msite certification training and online exam arrangement. It will be a golden opportunity to get certified from google and there will be also some other exciting part which will bring happines to your mind !

GDG Sonargaon offers unique activities targeted to Web developers such as Developer Keynote, workshops on mobile innovation for Web, Techtalk and on spot mobile site certification exam in this IO Extended Bangladesh 18

Nearly 600 people will participate the event. The participants will get cool gifts. Moreover, there will be photo booths which the participants will enjoy and get chances to get focus on social media . So don`t miss the chance , get your ticket and enjoy this energetic event .

#io18extended #gdgsonargaon

N.B. - This event is free and there will be no registration fees

events.name: Devfest Bangladesh 2018
events.description:
DevFest Bangladesh brings together experts in Web Technologies, Android, Machine Learning and Cloud technologies to Dhaka for sessions, workshops and showcases.
In this conference, our goal is to equip you with new knowledge & skills that you can immediately apply or bring back to your companies.

events.name: Cloud Study Jam
events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning. Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete with any labs you want.

group_profile.intro: Google Developer Group Sonargaon is a Google developers group in Bangladesh which aims to bring together a large group of developers and non-developers from Bangladesh to learn, share and know more about Google technologies.
